name: Keith Lane
text: This restaurant is definitely one of the finest place in the neighborhood. Every time I come to this place I am highly satisfied. They preserve their very high  standard service and the highest level of meals  they provide. You definitely will enjoy this this restaurant. Highly  recommended.

text: Pizza Hut is one of my preferred options for pizza. This location is about as convenient as it gets. I'm about ready to give that up & go elsewhere due to the consistent bad service.
